item.description: Jesus said, "It is God's good pleasure to give you the Kingdom." He also said, "God satisfies the desire of every living thing." The action of transformation occurs when something larger than you and your own understanding helps you attain what you want. If you really want something, you can have it. All religions have described this Universal Law and Truth. If something is not the way you want it to be, you can learn to change it to what you do want. Transformation is possible for everyone. Glimpse the vision of what your life could be, in this seminar designed to help you unlock the infinite possibilities of transformation.

group.name: Meditation & Inner Spirituality Group - New Haven

item.name: Seminar:TRANSFORMATION: Creating the Life You Want
